title: Flipped Learning-Based Language Learning Achievement Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language grammar and reading comprehension skills
context.additional_context: A course optimized for mobile learning environments using personal devices (BYOD), featuring pre-learning videos and project-based assessments through in-class interactions.

learning_goals: Students secure preparedness for class participation by watching 80% or more of weekly pre-learning videos within the designated timeframe
Improve language expressiveness by 20% through three or more peer feedback activities in a flipped learning environment
Achieve a B-grade or higher (70/100 points) in grammar utilization and creative expression aspects in the final project
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
